title: Gravel Groupsets, Time Trial Helmets and the Wild Tech World of Omloop Het Nieuwsblad
content:
Lidl-Trek uses SRAM Red XPLR gravel group, Visma-Lease a Bike goes all-aero as cobblestone racing enters new era.

Read the full article at Gravel Groupsets, Time Trial Helmets and the Wild Tech World of Omloop Het Nieuwsblad on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
